title: ‘Gm’: A Jolly Crypto Greeting Goes Viral, Sparks Squabbles
sub_head: The message, for ‘good morning,’ has become a rallying call for blockchain enthusiasts
body:
Two letters all over social media started as a jolly greeting among cryptocurrency fans and went on to inspire a new virtual currency, real-life tattoos and, naturally, online squabbles.
The catchphrase “gm”—or, to put it the old-fashioned way, good morning—is increasingly popping up on Twitter , Telegram and Discord channels, often alongside images of surf, sun-dappled flowers and sunsets.
